Title: Adera
Writer: Getchew (creator), Alemayo Kefle (head writer), Nega Tariku (creator)
Actors: Mikael Balcha, Tigist Kidane Gebre Hiwo, Alemayo Kefle, Zelalem Mekonnen
Plot: The story of an Ethiopian woman's plight in South Africa as she struggles to earn enough money to support and return to her children in Ethiopia.
